comments: I have taken Segura Lisses for all 3 of my elementary spanish classes because she knows what she is talking about. She is more difficult than the other spanish teachers, but if you actually want to learn spanish she is the best. Lectures mostly in english and makes you practice speaking a lot so be prepared!

She is an excellent an enthusiastic teacher. She is also incredibley nice and very willing to help any student. She is Cuban and is loud and fun in class. You will use a variety of learning methods. There will be workbook assignments, readings, games and group and partner work. Also she will teach you culture, even comon hispanic hand gestures

Best Spanish professor at SCU. I took both spanish 2 and 3 with her and she was great! Don\'t take her if you want an easy A, but if you work hard an A is very possible. She WILL teach you spanish, unlike the other professors in the dept who don\'t really know how to teach. Would highly recommend her to anyone interested in learning spanish.
Great Spanish professor! Knows her stuff and is always one step ahead. Straight forward and funny. Very nice and willing and able to help you.
Great professor! She is a very energetic and enthusiastic. Incorporates the material into activities that are relative to real everyday conversation. I highly recommend taking her class.
Makes you talk a lot in class but is very very helpful. You actually learn a lot in her class.
All you have to do is ask for help and profesora goes out of her way to explain concepts until you understand them. Very enjoyable class and professor.

She\'s a really good. She actually cares about the students learning and makes an effort to make sure that everyone understands the lesson. That said, don\'t be afraid to ask questions. Be prepared to have homework every single night. It\'s ok though because the homework is easy if you pay attention.
She is the best Spanish professor I have ever had. I have learned so much from her and she genuinely cares about student learning. Definitely take a class with her!
Good teacher. Fast paced, definitely not boring. Expects a lot of participation, mandatory attendance. Tests are easy if you\'ve actually been following along. Good spanish 2 prof
Profesora is very compassionate about her students learning. She is always willing to help out and she is very clear and concise. I would recommend her for any class she teaches.

Professor Lisses can come off as a bit intimidating because she\'s loud and sarcastic, but she\'s actually really nice and explains things very clearly. Unfortunately, 30% of the final grade is "class participation", so if she likes you, I guess you get an A so...make sure you review your vocabulary before coming to class.
